T02D2129:175b-1: sva tsitta bzhi shr'a mo panytsi bam sha ti k'a g'a th'a n'a ma /
T02D2129:175b-3: rang gi sems ngal so ba'i man ngag tshigs su
T02D2129:175b-4: bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba
T02D2129:175b-5: / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2129:175b-6: ae ma'o gdod nam ma skyes pa //
T02D2129:175b-8: gzhan min rang gi snying dbus nas //
T02D2129:175b-9: bla ma'i zhal las shes par 'gyur //
T02D2129:175b-10: gang skyes gnyug ma nyid yin phyir //
T02D2129:175b-11: gang shar dran pa ma brjed na /
T02D2129:175b-12: de shar stong pa nyid bdag tu //
T02D2129:175b-13: rnal 'byor rgyal po gdon mi za //
T02D2129:175b-14: gang shar thams cad de yin te //
T02D2129:175b-15: de ni gang du'ang ma shar ba'o //
T02D2129:175b-16: de phyir gang skyes de ma skyes //
T02D2129:175b-17: ma skyes pa nyid skyes pa'i tshul //
T02D2129:175b-18: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum sdigs mdzub gtad //
T02D2129:175b-19: rdo rje'i lta bas bltas nas ni //
T02D2129:175b-21: gnas nas du ma gcig tu bya //
T02D2129:175b-22: rkang pa rgya mtsho che la gzhag / lag pa sa steng kun du nyul //
T02D2129:175b-23: mig gnyis nam mkha' blta bya ste //
T02D2129:175b-24: yid ni gang du'ang mi g-yo'o //
T02D2129:175b-25: sgeg mo'i me long stobs kyi gyad //
T02D2129:175b-26: khri brtson rgyal po'i btsun mo dang //
T02D2129:175b-27: phyag dar ba dang smad 'tshong bzhin //
T02D2129:175b-28: gcig pur grogs dang 'grogs par byos //
T02D2129:175b-29: stag dang seng ge glang chen dang //
T02D2129:175b-30: rnga mo khri snyan spre'u dang //
T02D2129:175b-31: tsandan sdong po mi ro ltar //
T02D2129:175b-32: mkhas pas stong nyid rnal 'byor bya //
T02D2129:175b-33: ri gzar chu dang rgya mtsho che /
T02D2129:176a-0: @176a * // bu gcig ma dang glang po skyong //
T02D2129:176a-1: gang ri dag dang shel dag bzhin //
T02D2129:176a-2: dmigs bral gyur nas gzhi tshugs pa'o //
T02D2129:176a-3: thog ma bar dang mthar rim bzhin //
T02D2129:176a-4: rtsa ba ngo bo bye bral ba //
T02D2129:176a-5: rmi lam gyi ni mar mo bzhin //
T02D2129:176a-6: snying brtse mi g-yo goms pas 'grub //
T02D2129:176a-7: 'gro 'od gnas ni skye gnas 'gag / rnam dag stong pa nyid rnam gsum //
T02D2129:176a-8: bde chen 'od gsal rnam mi rtog / blo bzangs
T02D2129:176a-9: rnams kyis mnyam par gzhag / snying rje chen po
T02D2129:176a-10: mdun gzhag ste // de nyid ma yengs rtag blta zhing //
T02D2129:176a-11: lha dang bla ma'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2129:176a-12: sgrubs po ni ngal bso bya //
T02D2129:176a-13: bu nyon khyod gang rnam par rtog /'dir bdag ma bcings mi grol phyir //
T02D2129:176a-14: ma yengs ma bcos rang dgar ni //
T02D2129:176a-15: kye ho dub pa ngal so cig / gzugs brnyan gzugs dang brag ca sgra //
T02D2129:176a-16: dngos dang rmi lam dran pa'i yid //
T02D2129:176a-18: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad sgom pa //
T02D2129:176a-19: gser bzhin me bzhin nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D2129:176a-20: shes byed zhi byed dag par byed //
T02D2129:176a-21: snang med de snang rkyen gyis snang //
T02D2129:176a-22: nam mkha' me long shel bzhin te //
T02D2129:176a-23: ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang //
T02D2129:176a-24: gzungs kyi sgo yis de rtogs byed //
T02D2129:176a-25: mthong ba mnyam gzhag 'od gsal te//
T02D2129:176a-26: de tshe de mthong de ma skyes //
T02D2129:176a-27: shin tu mi rtog rtse gcig gnas //
T02D2129:176a-28: g-yeng ba'i rdul dang bral ba nyid //
T02D2129:176a-30: de lus khyim nang btson bzung nas //
T02D2129:176a-31: yid kyis skyes bu gsad byas na //
T02D2129:176a-32: de med sems ni gang du 'gro //
T02D2129:176a-33: thams cad rang bzhin ma bcos pa ;
T02D2129:176a-34: / kun rtog thams cad rkyen gyi dbang //
T02D2129:176a-35: rang bzhin gsum gyis de shes nas //
T02D2129:176a-36: kun rtog kun rtog med par byed //
T02D2129:176a-37: mthong bas grub dang bshig pa nas //
T02D2129:176a-38: med ces rnam par rtog par zad //
T02D2129:176a-39: 'di la gdod nas ci yang med //
T02D2129:176a-40: bu kye nam mkha' bsgom par byos //
T02D2129:176a-41: ga bur dang ni de yi dri //
T02D2129:176a-42: phan tshun de med de yang med //
T02D2129:176a-43: de bzhin rkyen dang rkyen bral ba //
T02D2129:176a-44: so so ma yin rang dgar bsgom //
T02D2129:176a-45: mnyam pa'i sems kyi g-yo ba 'gog / mi mnyam dran pas 'ching bar byed //
T02D2129:176a-46: de tshe de dang bral mnyam gzhag / rnam par rtog pa gsod par byed //
T02D2129:176b-0: khrus byas nam @176b mkha'i gos gyon la //
T02D2129:176b-1: rnam par rtog pa sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2129:176b-2: dran pa'i thal ba 'jug dogs su //
T02D2129:176b-3: chu lhung lhan cig skyong bar gyis //
T02D2129:176b-4: snod bcud rlung rgyun brtan g-yo mkha' //
T02D2129:176b-5: nyi ma zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02D2129:176b-6: me khyer char dang bung pa'i dpes //
T02D2129:176b-7: dam tshig phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2129:176b-8: sna tshogs yid kyi me tog las //
T02D2129:176b-9: dga' ba rnam bzhi'i bcud blangs te //
T02D2129:176b-10: lhan cig skyas pa'i ro myangs pas //
T02D2129:176b-11: yid kyi skyes bu tshim par 'gyur //
T02D2129:176b-12: lus rlung rtsa chen phyag rgya yis //
T02D2129:176b-13: lus ngag yid ni bcing bar bya //
T02D2129:176b-14: drod thob pa la thogs pa med //
T02D2129:176b-15: kun spyod nges par mi bya'o ;
T02D2129:176b-16: / rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems ngal sos par
T02D2129:176b-17: byed pa'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu
T02D2129:176b-18: rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba de kho na nyid
T02D2129:176b-19: rnal du mtshon par byed pa'i do ha rdzogs so
T02D2129:176b-21: / // / jo bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las man
T02D2129:176b-22: ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa nyid dngos su gsan
T02D2129:176b-23: nas grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
T02D2129:176b-24: chen po shr'i dza ga mi tra a'a na nda
T02D2129:176b-25: dang / lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis dpal
T02D2129:176b-26: gu lang gser khang gi nags khrod aam pa ra
